original_text: All the four wheels looked the same. Each wheel had another wheel that went across the middle of it.
korean_text: 그 모양은 넷이 꼭 같은데 마치 바퀴 안에 바퀴가 있는 것 같으며

sentences.original_text: All the four wheels looked the same

sentences.korean_translation: 각 바퀴는 다른 바퀴를 가지고 있었다

sentences.original_text: that went across the middle of it
